data.title: Gorka Kozmetik
data.text:
Gorka has a simple no-nonsense approach to your Private Label requirements. For qualifying customers, we offer a manufacturing service that allows you to customise our extensive range of products with your company branding. Our on-site laboratory can also formulate bespoke products to suit your requirements and we can create any formulation to your brand.

Our in-house design team has a range of design templates to simplify the Private Label process and make the transition from order to delivery as fast as possible, or we can design packaging to suit your exact requirements. We provide Private Label products to over 30+ countries worldwide and offer a complete language translation service. All products are supported with technical data and information sheets. The following products are available for qualifying Private Label customers:

Toilet Rim Blocks, Detergent, Powders & Liquids, Dishwasher Liquids, Bleaches & Disinfectants, Creams, Floorcare Products, Handsoaps, Specialist applications

Gorka approach to Private Label is to present custom solutions that fit the diverse needs of your business, offering you full control of your brand every step of the way.
